javadoc: Provider of Highlight objects appropriate for the text, object, and FieldFactory class.

methods.name: getHighlights
methods.comment: Get the highlights appropriate for the given text, object, and FieldFactory class.

params.name: text
params.comment: the entire text contained in the field, regardless of layout.

params.name: obj
params.comment: object that provides the information to be rendered (usually a code unit)

params.name: fieldFactoryClass
params.comment:
the class that indicates what type of field is being rendered.
 For Example, address fields would have the AddressFieldFactory class.

params.name: cursorTextOffset
params.comment: the cursor position within the given text or -1 if no cursor in this field.

return.comment:
an array of highlight objects that indicate the location within the text string to
 be highlighted.

name: HighlightProvider
comment: Provider of Highlight objects appropriate for the text, object, and FieldFactory class.
